Reviews.Content: hotel located near alexander platz starting sightseeing shopping hub public transport berlin shopping spree spend night hotel 1 night hotel mitte returning customer cold bathroom stench simply unbearable breakfast basic nicely served theres proper reception waiter checks advantages price multilingual staff heard turkish german english
